info.description: Be the first to reach the highest spot!
info.ruleText:
Definition A stack is a group of at least 2 pieces. A space refers to a cell from the board. It can be free or occupied by a single piece or a stack. Pieces, stacks and spaces are colored and owned by the player of that color. Goal Players want to be the first to build a stack of 6 pieces, or prevent opponent from having a legal move. Turn On their turn, player must take one action : - Move a stack OR - Move a piece Move a stack 
A player can move a stack of their color to any free space of their color. The entire stack must be moved and cannot be split. Move a piece
A player can move a piece to another space. The movement can only be initiated between spaces of equal height, and owned by that player.   

Block A player blocks a row/column when having the highest stack of a line. In that case, their opponent is not allowed to move any piece or stack from that blocked line. A piece or stack from other spaces can still be played onto a blocked line. No blocking occurs when stacks of opposing color and equal height share a same row or column.
info.helpText:
- Players take seat
- On their turn, players move a stack or a piece by dragging it on the board

fields.text: Are you sure you want to restart the game?
